diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Pruritic urticarial papules and plaques of pregnancy
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with an extensive pruritic rash characterized by erythematous papules that spread across various body parts and was unresponsive to topical corticosteroids. The resolution of fever and rash following high-dose corticosteroid treatment, alongside negative infectious disease tests and normal paraclinical investigations, led to the final diagnosis.
